official_title: A bill to amend the Housing Act of 1949 to reduce the rental payments required to be paid by families residing in rural rental housing.
short_title: Rural Housing Rent Relief Act of 1988

summary.text: Rural Housing Rent Relief Act of 1988 - Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to deduct amounts paid as withholding (and self-employment) taxes and social security (and railroad retirement) contributions for purposes of rural housing income eligibility. Limits such assisted rent to not more than comparable private rentals in the area, with a specified exception.

titles.title: Rural Housing Rent Relief Act of 1988
A bill to amend the Housing Act of 1949 to reduce the rental payments required to be paid by families residing in rural rental housing.
